greetingsystem.generalusage.admin.message: Usage: !greeting [toggle | enable [default | message text] | disable | setdefault ]. Tags for message text: (name)

greetingsystem.generalusage.other.message: Usage: !greeting [ enable [default | message text] | disable ]. Tags for message text: (name)

greetingsystem.remove.personal.success.message: Successfully removed your personal greeting message.

greetingsystem.set.autogreet.enabled.message: Auto Greeting Enabled. $1 will now greet viewers with a greeting configured.

greetingsystem.set.autogreet.noname.message: Please use the (name) tag in the default greeting.
